channel.title: Model animating help
channel.description:
How do i animate a model? i have rsposer but it makes absolutely no sense to me at all.. and i looked at the tut and it doesnt do anything....
yeah i need to know how to make things spin around this sword i'm making
(and also, sorry for the double post)

item.title: Model animating help
item.dc:creator: @Timberpig1 Timberpig.
item.description:
@Timberpig1 wrote:

just to make the sword have an animatoin… similar to the new abyssal whip… it has an anim…

how to make that.

Read full topic

item.title: Model animating help
item.dc:creator: @h1_sk1ller h1 sk1ller
item.description:
@h1_sk1ller wrote:

Wrong section, this should be in the client hacking or model requests section… Umm are you meaning animating it to move with the character eg priorities to automatically animate itself as a sword (Or in other words to stop it going invisible when its fitted onto the player)? Or like adding custom animations to the sword?

Read full topic
